title: Research
text:
Below are sample entries. Replace with your own papers.

Working Papers

Title: The Sectoral Earnings Gap and Comparative Advantage
Status: Job Market Paper (draft)
PDF: Download
Abstract:
Short abstract goes here. Summarize the question, method, data, and main result in ~150 words.


Title: CBDC and Growth in Developing Economies
Status: Draft
PDF: Download
Abstract:
Short abstract goes here.


How to add a paper

Put the PDF into the papers/ folder (e.g., papers/my-paper.pdf).

Add a new entry above with a link like [Download](/papers/my-paper.pdf).

Rebuild the site with quarto preview (local) or publish (see README).

title: CV
text:
Put your latest CV as a PDF at cv/cv.pdf and it will be linked below.

CV (PDF): Download


Tip: Name the file cv.pdf (all lowercase) so the link above just works when you drop in your new file.

title: Home
text:
PhD Candidate in Economics, McGill University


Research: development, economic growth & structural transformation, econometrics.


View CV Research

title: Home
text:
Welcome
This is your simple academic website. Use it to host your CV and working papers.
Everything here is generated by Quarto and can be deployed free on GitHub Pages.

Update the text on this page in index.qmd.
Add or edit papers in research.qmd.
Drop your latest CV at cv/cv.pdf and it will be linked from the CV page.
